doc.title: Name a Thai Restaurant Competition!
doc.text: Our/PRP$ friends/NNS at/IN Joe/NNP 's/POS Kitchen/NN have/VBN listen/VBN to/TO your/PRP$ comments/NN regarding/IN the/DT name/NN of/IN their/PRP$ restaurant/NN and/CC have/VB decided/VBD to/TO change/NN it/PRP !/. But/CC they/PRP are/VBP having/VBG a/DT difficult/JJ time/NN trying/VBG to/TO come/VB up/RP with/IN a/DT new/JJ name/NN ,/, so/IN they/PRP have/VBP requested/VBN for/IN help/VB from/IN our/PRP$ readers/NNS ./. And/CC to/TO make/VB it/PRP worth/IN your/PRP$ while/NN ,/, they/PRP will/MD be/VB awarding/VBD a/DT Dinner/NN for/IN six/CD at/IN their/PRP$ restaurant/NN to/TO the/DT winner/NN !/. So/RB get/VB cracking/NN and/CC do/VB remember/VB to/TO write/VB in/IN with/IN a/DT registered/JJ pen/NN name/NN so/RB that/IN we/PRP can/MD notify/VB you/PRP should/VB you/PRP win/NN ./. Competition/PRP ends/VBZ next/JJ Saturday/NN ./. The/DT judges/NN decision/NN is/VBZ final/JJ and/CC blah/JJ blah/NN blah/NN .../: you/PRP know/VB all/DT the/DT rest/NN ./. Here/RB 's/POS the/DT previous/JJ post/NN of/IN the/DT restaurant/NN ./.
